QuestData.Title: Cracking the Code
QuestData.Description: I sense a distinct peculiarity in the drakes here but the meaning of the runes that cover their bodies still eludes me.$b$bWithout a codex, it will take more time than we can afford for me to interpret them.$b$bNot far from here is a Kirin Tor traitor, Caleras, who is likely to have a copy of the tome I require. His underlings hold the runes I will need for my translation.$b$bHurry, mortal. Malygos gains strength with every passing moment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Raelorasz at the Transitus Shield wants you to get the Azure Codex from Inquisitor Caleras and collect 3 Shimmering Runes from his Coldarra Spellbinders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hurry, mortal.$b$bMalygos gains strength with every passing moment.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $r.$b$bLet us hope for a clue that we can use against Malygos.
